column1: Paiçandu is a city in the state of Paraná in southern Brazil. Paiçandu was founded in 1948
column2: and emancipated on 19 November 1960. Its population was 39

column1: Paiçandu's subtropical climate offers hot summers and concentrated wet seasons; Paiçandu has no dry season. The average high temperature is 22 °C. Frost rarely accompanies the winter weather (the average low temperature is 18 °C).
